title: Thinking of looking for a consistent duo buddy. I just wanna get out of bronze bro D:

embed.description: the killer duck / Bronze 3 8LP / 20W 16L Win Ratio 56% / Amumu - 11W 4L Win Ratio 73%, Braum - 3W 4L Win Ratio 43%, Nasus - 3W 3L Win Ratio 50%, Karma - 2W 3L Win Ratio 40%, Teemo - 1W 1L Win Ratio 50%

body:
So for the past two seasons, I have been stuck in bronze 3-2, mainly for the lack of time spent on  ranked and carrying on normal for fun. For myself I am keen on playing jg and top, and have no worries playing the support role. Just put in mind that I am mainly terrible at ADC and mid lane . Don't hesitate to look at my performance on op.gg. just hit me up whenever you're ready

- the killer duck (oce)

replies.body: Added you just now - i usually main support :D so maybe we can help from 2 lanes
